tgt_original: kiṃ ca kleśagrahāveśād duḥkhaṃ duḥkhātureṣvapi |  kṛtaṃ yeṣu mayā pūrvaṃ kṣatakṣāropahāravat ||15 ||
na nayet kadalīphenaniḥsāraṃ merusāratām ||31 ||  pratikṣaṇaṃ jarāmṛtyurujāmāśrayamāśrayam |

bodhicittāparityāgo nāma prathamaḥ paricchedaḥuṣaceṣṭitaiḥ |  nānantamapi saṃsāraṃ tiṣṭhedekamaho yathā ||29 ||  kaḥ parārthaikakāryāṇāmāryāṇāṃ paddhatiṃ kṛtī |  dvitīyaḥ paricchedaḥ  munivratasamāśrayaḥ
